Registration Form for the BCA Spring Meeting
The University of Reading, 7 -10 April, 2001

Click here to read the notes on completing the registration form, then print this page from your Web browser, complete it and send to the organiser at the address at the end, with your payment unless you are a student applying for a bursary, when you send the payment when you know whether or not you have been awarded a bursary.
